name: wordwise
description: AI-powered writing assistant with Firebase emulator support

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run emulator" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: concurrently "cd frontend && npm test" "cd backend && python -m pytest"
